content: On November 29, former US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger passed away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 30, the first anniversary of Jiang Zemin's death, people went to the gate of his former residence at No. 16 Dongquanmen, Yangzhou to lay flowers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens commented on the movie "Napoleon": We already have our own emperor, why should we go to see someone else's emperor?

China Railway 14th Bureau has been in arrears of wages for several months for the Chongqing-Guizhou shield tunneling equipment company.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 29, Shichangfang Village, Jiexiu City, Shanxi Province.
Due to years of coal mining, the houses in the village have cracks and even collapsed. The government refused to resettle them. The villagers are homeless.
On that day, a large number of villagers came to the municipal government to defend their rights, but were beaten by staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 29, Wafangdian, Dalian, Liaoning.
Because the government owed sanitation workers wages, the streets were piled with garbage and no one cleaned it up.
On November 30, a staff member of the Propaganda Department of the Wafangdian Municipal Party Committee said that the garbage had been cleaned up and the wages had been paid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 29, the topic of "What does 110,000 yuan mean to an ordinary family" became a hot search

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 29, Luo Canhong, the daughter of the person involved in the Yiyang 414 torture case, used a camera to record the residence where her father Luo Shuzhong was detained at the time. Luo Canhong said in the video that after the family paid a bail of 70 million yuan, the plastic track and the entire building were renovated. From the video, it can be seen that the room where Luo Shuzhong and other victims in this case were detained had only a small window.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 29, a video from Shaoxing, Zhejiang Province showed a black sedan with a license plate number of "浙DQ68E8" stopping a No. 661 bus twice.
The black sedan had the words "公务" (official business) on its body. Some netizens said it should be a custom car sticker.
The local 12345 responded that it was unable to trace back which department through the license plate and would report it to the superiors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/AdDcXPnZdv

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 29, a netizen from Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture, Sichuan Province, posted a video complaining that the grid workers in the local community always come to check whether they eat on the ground every now and then.
If they find out, they will be accused of being uncivilized.
Netizens are puzzled. Do you even want us to control our freedom? What is civilization? If you respect other people's living habits, you are civilized. This is our custom.
Previously, the local government had issued a "Penalty Standard", which stipulated that squatting to eat would be fined 20 yuan, and not washing the dishes would be fined 10 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/C3iJIctrpo

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 30, workers at Baoyi Shoe Factory in Yangzhou, Jiangsu Province, went on strike to protect their rights.
Baoyi Shoe Factory, which has been in operation for 17 years, announced on the 29th that it would shut down its domestic factory at the end of the year and move the factory to Indonesia.
However, Baoyi Shoe Factory only mentioned the payment of compensation in the announcement, and did not elaborate on the details of the compensation. This move caused strong dissatisfaction among the workers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, it was found that the vehicle belonged to the Shangyu District Water Group and the man has been suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 4 pm on November 25th in Taipei, a group of Taiwanese students and young people marched around the Legislative Yuan, led by "Teacher Li is not your teacher" Bai Maoqi, singing "If You Don't Want to Walk in the Front" along the way. Returning to the north side of the Legislative Yuan, a "Toronto Square Face" avatar sign and a white cat flag were hung on the spot. People gathered to listen to the speeches of Associate Professor Tao Yifen of the Department of Political Science of National Taiwan University, Deputy Secretary-General of the National Taiwan Federation of Students Huang Tingwei, President of the National Taiwan University Student Union Zhuang Zhicheng, and Xiang Nan. , handed out flyers, and then entered the open mic session.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Since Associate Professor Tao Yifen was not present, the student union president Zhuang Zhicheng read the speech on his behalf. Tao believes that one person's actions like Peng Zaizhou's demonstration are not a single action, but when connected together are the force that rolls the wheel of history and progress. Its two meanings are to expose the lies of the dictator and become a witness to history.

She quoted from Democracy and the…

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of November 30, in Hainan, the police suddenly came to a man's house and verbally summoned him for investigation without any documents.
The man refused the summons without reason. The police initially replied that it was inconvenient to disclose, and then replied that it was suspected of false accusation and framing when questioned.
But the man insisted that he did not falsely accuse anyone. About an hour later, some local residents and the police on the scene were in a stalemate.
Afterwards, the video was deleted
